name: Motorbike (itch)
description:
In Motorbike you have to survive as long as possible while dodging car.
Use the arrow key to control the Motorbike.

The longer you survive, the harder it gets !

In Motorbike you have 4 difficulties ;

The first one, and the most easy of all is Normal Speed.
This is your speed at the beginning,
you have the time to see the other car coming and getting used to the control.

Then there is High Speed, still easy,
but can put you in difficult situation at times.

Then Mega Speed
This is where the fun begin !
car goes fast and you have little time to react.

And then finally Ultimium Speed
your reflex will need to be perfect.
you don't have the time for any mistake.

Please put your score on the comment section ! <3

And that's it, i was planning on doing more on this game, but i'm almost at the 8192 caractère limit of pico8. My code is messy and unoptimise, so there is probably a 100 ways to do it better and more optimise. If you have advise to give me, i would love it, i'm a beginner and i really need feedback.

It's also my first time making music, hope it's ok.

Have fun !
